lines: THERE IS SUNLIGHT IN THE HEART
Pesi kusalala kwini kuzuzya moyo onse,
Nkaambo mwakal Ôomo Jesu, Mula salala lyonse.
Kusalala o kusalala, Kusalala mu moyo,
Jesu wagusya kupenga, Nkusalala mu moyo.
Ndasowa kupenga kwangu, Mbuli cisani cibi,
Aku munzi wa bulemu, Ngowaka ndijanina,
Moyo wangu ula unka, Moyo ula cilila.
Mufutuli wandi ula, Abuumi bwangu bonse,
Aku munzi wa bulemu, Ngowaka ndijanina,
Moyo wangu ula unka, Moyo ula cilila.
